Class DownloadHtml

  • java.lang.Object
    • DownloadHtml

  • public class DownloadHtml
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which performs the connection with the webpage, downloads the source code of the page and writes it into a new file. The name of the file is produced automatically using an object from the Random class. The file is placed in a folder whose name comes from the domain of the webpage.
    Author:
    Web Masters

      • generateFileName

        private java.lang.String generateFileName(java.lang.String folderName)
        Method which produces a random file name which has this format: x000000000 (x: random alphabet letter, 0: random digit 0-9).
        Parameters:
        folderName - the name of the folder in which we want to put the new file
        Returns:
        the new file's name
